name: Slash Slash Revolution
description:
God of War style chain blade combat in VR.

Created for the Unreal Engine Spring Game Jam 2017. This is a hack-and-slash action game for VR we threw together over the weekend. Feel free to let us know if you enjoy it!

We highly suggest stretching first. People were harmed in the making of this game.

Controls:

-Swing controllers to attack

-left touchpad/joystick to move

-triggers to grapple

Learn more about this game and our other projects over at: www.562interactive.com/news
